legal_documents.excerpt: Client engages TechServices for software development services. Service period: January 1, 2024 to December 31, 2024. Monthly fee: $50,000. Payment due within 30 days of invoice. Intellectual property rights transfer to Client upon full payment. Either party may terminate with 60 days written notice.

Parties agree to maintain confidentiality of proprietary information shared for potential business collaboration. Confidential information excludes publicly available data, information developed independently, and information disclosed by third parties. Term of agreement: 3 years from execution. Unauthorized disclosure subjects breaching party to injunctive relief and damages.

Employee hired as Senior Software Engineer. Annual salary: $150,000. Benefits include health insurance, 401(k) matching at 4%, 20 days paid time off. At-will employment. Non-compete clause applies within 50-mile radius for 2 years post-employment. Intellectual property created during employment belongs to company.

Tenant leases commercial property (Suite 500) for term of 3 years. Monthly rent: $5,000. Tenant responsible for utilities, insurance, and maintenance. Landlord provides HVAC and roof repair. Lease includes 2% annual rent increase. Security deposit: $15,000. 30 days notice required for non-renewal.

Seller agrees to sell machinery and equipment valued at $500,000. Purchase price: $450,000 (10% discount). Payment: $150,000 at signing, balance due at delivery. Equipment sold 'as-is' with 90-day warranty on parts. Delivery within 45 days. Buyer may inspect before acceptance.
